author: Anthony Robledo
title: Viral photo of forlorn Spiral Hot Dogs owner leads to booming business
text: Customer's photo of forlorn owner in empty restaurant leads business to boom at OK diner Nick Chappell had never been to Spirals Hot Dogs & More before he took a photo of Scott Hosek in his empty restaurant. But after business boomed, Chappell's part of the Spirals family, Hosek says. [Anthony Robledo](https://www.usatoday.com/staff/7612431001/anthony-robledo/) An Oklahoma hot dog joint owner visibly wanted customers one day and he soon got more than he bargained for. During a slow shift on Dec. 20, a customer took a photo of Scott Hosek standing by his restaurant entrance waiting for diners and shared it on social media. Hosek would soon have no time to stand around as " [Spirals: Hot Dogs & More](https://spiralshotdogs.com/)," in Norman, Oklahoma, saw booming business once the post went viral. "We immediately started doing double digits in sales," Hosek told USA TODAY on Thursday. "It happened really fast to me." The day the photo was taken, Hosek found himself staring out the window upset his family business of four years wasn't booming as well as others ahead of Christmas. Hosek said he had no idea why Spirals saw a sudden wave of new customers after Dec. 20 until the person responsible for posting the photo, Nick Chappell, later apologized and offered to take the post down. Hosek wouldn't hear of it. "You just wouldn't expect it. Social media is amazing. It's amazing that people get involved with it," he said. "But more importantly, it's the stuff that you just don't think would work. That's what works." 'I will always love you': [See Dolly Parton grant Utah man's dying wish to meet her](/story/life/humankind/2023/12/26/dolly-parton-meets-longtime-fan/72033945007/) Customer knew he had to capture 'wholesome moment' Chappell visited the Norman area for his job as an Oklahoma Army National Guard. As part of their weekly hot dog Wednesday routine, Chappell and a his co-worker found Spirals on Google Maps and took a chance. Noticing Hosek gazing, Chappell decided to capture the "wholesome moment" on Snapchat captioning "He has been standing here waiting on customers to come in." "A good buddy of mine named Chad said, 'Hey, man, you can either post this on Facebook or I'm going to post this on Facebook. Some way or another we're going to get this guy some customers,'" Chappell said. In a Facebook post, Chappell gave an excellent recommendation of the restaurant, complimenting their food and "off the charts" service. He shared a photo of his dish, the menu and of Hosek waiting for diners. Chappell was blown away by the success of the post, which has since had over 2,000 shares, and even more surprised to see over 70 guests at the diner during his next visit. "I'm not a huge social media guy I typically don't share," Chappell said. "I don't even know really the words to describe it as but it made me even that much happier that I did make a post." Owner adds new 'Thunderbird' item in customer's honor Hosek is showing his gratitude by adding a new item in Chappell's honor. Having named hot dogs and bowls after family members, he was more than happy to do so. The "Thunderbird" is a hot link with bacon, cream cheese and jalape√±os, Hosek said. The meal gets its name from the Thunderbird Unit Patch for the 45th Infantry, which Chappell is a part of. The two reconnected at the restaurant on Thursday, where they both got emotional talking about the post's impact. Chappell received a certificate of appreciation during the unveiling of the "Thunderbird" and was told he is now forever part of the Spirals family. "To know that it was a humble guy that just saw our need and did what he could. He doesn‚Äôt have a real following on social media, he hardly ever shares anything and to know that one post had so much power. It was super cool," Hosek added.

title: Avoir √©t√© maltrait√© dans son enfance peut affecter le cerveau de sa prog√©niture
text:
- Une √©tude r√©v√®le que le stress v√©cu durant l‚Äôenfance peut modifier l‚Äô√©pig√©nome du sperme, influen√ßant potentiellement les g√©n√©rations futures.
- Chez les hommes ayant subi des maltraitances importantes, des modifications de la m√©thylation de l‚ÄôADN et des niveaux d‚ÄôARN non codants ont √©t√© observ√©es, pouvant affecter le d√©veloppement c√©r√©bral des descendants.
- "Montrer que ces modifications √©pig√©n√©tiques influencent directement les caract√©ristiques des descendants r√©√©crirait les r√®gles de l‚Äôh√©r√©dit√©", selon les chercheurs.
Le stress v√©cu durant l‚Äôenfance, comme des faits de maltraitance, peut modifier le sperme et ainsi affecter le d√©veloppement c√©r√©bral des g√©n√©rations d‚Äôapr√®s. C‚Äôest la conclusion d‚Äôune nouvelle √©tude men√©e par l‚ÄôUniversit√© de Turku, en Finlande, et publi√©e dans la revue [Molecular Psychiatry](https://www.nature.com/articles/s41380-024-02872-3). Cette d√©couverte ouvre des perspectives sur la transmission interg√©n√©rationnelle des effets du stress et, plus globalement, sur notre compr√©hension des r√®gles h√©r√©ditaires.
Qu‚Äôest-ce que l‚Äôh√©ritage √©pig√©n√©tique ?
L‚Äôh√©ritage √©pig√©n√©tique d√©signe la transmission d‚Äôinformations acquises √† la g√©n√©ration suivante, sans qu'elles soient cod√©es dans la s√©quence ADN. Ainsi, des changements induits par l‚Äôenvironnement peuvent influencer les g√©n√©rations futures par le biais des gam√®tes. Or, ces modifications √©pig√©n√©tiques, comme la m√©thylation de l‚ÄôADN ou l‚Äôexpression de mol√©cules d‚ÄôARN non codantes, jouent un r√¥le crucial dans le fonctionnement cellulaire et pourraient affecter le d√©veloppement c√©r√©bral de l‚Äôenfant.
Les chercheurs ont √©tudi√© les profils √©pig√©n√©tiques du sperme de 55 hommes d‚Äô√¢ge moyen, class√©s selon leur exposition au stress durant l‚Äôenfance, mesur√©e par la Trauma and Distress Scale (TADS). Chez les hommes ayant subi des maltraitances importantes, les scientifiques ont observ√© une m√©thylation plus faible dans trois r√©gions de l‚ÄôADN, ainsi que des niveaux alt√©r√©s de plusieurs mol√©cules d‚ÄôARN non codant. Des variations √©pig√©n√©tiques qui, selon l‚Äô√©tude, pourraient largement influencer le d√©veloppement c√©r√©bral de leurs enfants.
Limiter les effets des traumatismes du p√®re sur ses enfants
"Montrer que ces modifications influencent directement les caract√©ristiques des descendants r√©√©crirait les r√®gles de l‚Äôh√©r√©dit√©, assurent les chercheurs dans un [communiqu√©](https://medicalxpress.com/news/2025-01-childhood-maltreatment-sperm-affecting-future.html). Mais des recherches plus approfondies sont n√©cessaires pour le confirmer", notamment sur le stress p√©rinatal et l‚Äô√©pig√©nome du sperme.
En d√©voilant les impacts potentiels du stress infantile sur les g√©n√©rations futures, cette √©tude marque n√©anmoins une √©tape cruciale. Elle ouvre la voie √† des interventions pr√©ventives pour limiter les cons√©quences √† long terme des traumatismes sur la sant√© mentale et physique des g√©n√©rations d‚Äôapr√®s.

author: Ukrainska Pravda
title: All-for-all POW exchange possible at Peace Summit ‚Äì Zelenskyy | Ukrainska Pravda
text: President Volodymyr Zelenskyy has said that an all-for-all exchange of prisoners of war could happen before the end of the war, within the framework of the Peace Summit. Source: Zelenskyy speaking to border guards in Khmelnytskyi Quote: "Ideally, we would like to swap all for all. All reasonable countries support this route. We are conducting exchanges, but they are slower than we would like. Some people say that an all-for-all swap will be possible 'only after the war is over'. Because this is one of the conditions for ending a war. I believe that we have an opportunity to try to make this happen earlier. There is a convenient platform at the Peace Summit on 15-16 June." Details: Zelenskyy said that Ukraine has three priority issues for the Summit: energy and nuclear security; free navigation with no blockades of the seas; and the issue of all-for-all POW exchanges and bringing back the Ukrainian children who have been forcibly deported to Russia. Background: Zelenskyy‚Äôs spokesperson Serhii Nykyforov said the participants of the Peace Summit to be held in Switzerland on 15-16 June will work out a joint negotiating position of Ukraine, which will be submitted to Russia. author: Patrizio Caro
title: Lesi√≥n de Giakoumakis preocupa a Cruz Azul rumbo a liguilla del Apertura 2024
text:
Lesi√≥n de Giakoumakis preocupa a Cruz Azul rumbo a liguilla del Apertura 2024
El delantero griego, clave en el ataque de la ‚ÄòM√°quina Cementera‚Äô, encendi√≥ las alarmas al salir lesionado en la victoria contra FC Ju√°rez, dejando en duda su participaci√≥n ante Pumas.
CIUDAD DE M√âXICO.- El panorama en Cruz Azul es agridulce. A pesar de que el equipo dirigido por Mart√≠n Anselmi sigue dominando el Apertura 2024 y asegur√≥ su pase a los cuartos de final de la liguilla, una preocupaci√≥n mayor ha surgido: la lesi√≥n de Giorgos Giakoumakis, su delantero estrella.
La posible ausencia del goleador para los partidos clave que se avecinan genera incertidumbre en un equipo que ha basado gran parte de su √©xito en la contundencia ofensiva del griego.
Malas noticias para Cruz Azul: Giorgos Giakoumakis sale lesionado tras un choque con el arquero rival. La buena es que sali√≥ por su propio pie.
‚Äî Le√≥n Lecanda ü¶Å (@Leonlec)
Entr√≥ √Ångel Sep√∫lveda y en la banca est√° Gabriel ‚ÄúToro‚Äù Fern√°ndez listo para reaparecer en el 1er equipo tras 8 meses fuera por lesi√≥n.[pic.twitter.com/UxJDhdjzt3][October 24, 2024]
¬øC√≥mo se lesion√≥ Giakoumakis?
El delantero tuvo que abandonar el partido al minuto 22 durante la victoria de 3-1 contra FC Ju√°rez en la jornada 13. Aunque en un principio intent√≥ seguir jugando, las molestias musculares lo obligaron a pedir su cambio.
Seg√∫n el reportero de TUDN, Adri√°n Esparza Oteo, la lesi√≥n no se debi√≥ a un contacto con otro jugador, sino a una nueva molestia muscular que ha venido aquejando al futbolista en el transcurso de la temporada.
Esta situaci√≥n ha encendido las alarmas en La Noria, ya que las lesiones musculares han sido el tal√≥n de Aquiles de Giakoumakis desde su llegada.
Con seis goles y cuatro asistencias en el torneo, el griego se ha convertido en una pieza clave del ataque celeste, pero sus constantes problemas f√≠sicos han limitado su continuidad en los √∫ltimos encuentros.
Te podr√≠a interesar: ‚ÄòTata‚Äô Martino afirma que el Bal√≥n de Oro 2024 deber√≠a ser para Messi
¬øCu√°nto tiempo estar√° fuera?
La gravedad de la lesi√≥n a√∫n est√° por confirmarse. El t√©cnico Mart√≠n Anselmi coment√≥ tras el partido:
No sabr√≠a decir, porque hay que evaluarlo ma√±ana o pasado para ver si es un tema muscular o no‚Äú.
Esta respuesta deja en suspenso la participaci√≥n de Giakoumakis en el pr√≥ximo duelo ante Pumas este s√°bado 26 de octubre en el Estadio Ol√≠mpico Universitario.
En caso de que la lesi√≥n sea m√°s grave de lo esperado, Cruz Azul podr√≠a enfrentarse a un duro rev√©s en la etapa m√°s crucial del torneo.
El goleador griego ha sido fundamental en los logros recientes del equipo, y su ausencia en el cl√°sico ante Pumas ser√≠a un golpe importante para las aspiraciones del club.
La historia de las lesiones de Giakoumakis
Desde su llegada a Cruz Azul, Giorgos Giakoumakis ha demostrado ser un delantero letal, pero las lesiones han sido su mayor obst√°culo. Este tipo de molestias musculares han aparecido en diferentes momentos de la temporada, impidiendo que mantenga una regularidad constante en los encuentros.
Aunque su rendimiento dentro del campo ha sido sobresaliente, los problemas f√≠sicos han limitado su impacto en algunos partidos clave.
Con seis goles y cuatro asistencias en el torneo, el griego ha demostrado ser uno de los jugadores m√°s completos del equipo. Su capacidad para generar juego y concretar oportunidades ha sido vital para el √©xito de Cruz Azul en el Apertura 2024.
El futuro de la ‚ÄòM√°quina‚Äô sin Giakoumakis
En caso de que Giakoumakis no est√© disponible para el choque ante Pumas, Mart√≠n Anselmi tendr√° que buscar alternativas para no perder la potencia ofensiva que ha caracterizado a la ‚ÄòM√°quina‚Äô en este Apertura 2024. √Ångel Sep√∫lveda, quien ha respondido bien cuando se le ha requerido, podr√≠a ser el encargado de liderar el ataque celeste.
